title: ZIP Code Validation Success
description: Verify that entering a valid ZIP code within the service coverage area returns service availability and updates available contractors count within 1 second.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage
Enter a valid ZIP code within the service area into the ZIP code input field
Submit the ZIP code for validation
Check that the system confirms service availability
Verify the number of available contractors is displayed and accurate
Confirm response time is under 1 second

title: ZIP Code Validation Failure and Fallback
description: Verify that entering a ZIP code outside the service area shows appropriate fallback waitlist option and denies booking.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage
Enter a ZIP code outside the service coverage area
Submit ZIP code for validation
Check that the system denies service availability
Verify fallback waitlist option is displayed clearly

title: Service Selection and Dynamic Pricing Calculation
description: Verify customers can select base service packages and add-ons, including zone-based pricing multipliers, and the total price updates accordingly in real-time.

steps.description: Select a base car detailing service package
Select multiple add-ons
Ensure the system applies correct zone-based service multipliers
Check that the displayed total price matches the sum of base price, add-ons, and zone multiplier

title: Real-Time Calendar and Time Slot Availability
description: Verify available time slots are displayed in real-time based on contractor availability for the selected service and ZIP, and temporary holds prevent double bookings.

steps.description: Select service and enter ZIP code
Open interactive calendar
Verify available time slots correspond with contractor availability
Select a time slot
Confirm temporary hold on time slot is placed during checkout
Attempt another booking on same time slot concurrently
Verify system prevents double booking of the held slot

title: Stripe Connect Payment Success Flow
description: Verify booking payment completes successfully using Stripe Connect with 3D Secure support and booking confirmation is triggered.

steps.description: Select services and time slot
Proceed to secure Stripe Checkout
Input valid payment details supporting 3D Secure
Complete payment authentication
Verify payment intent is successful
Check booking confirmation is received
Confirm webhook triggers contractor assignment and booking status update

title: Stripe Payment Failure and Error Handling
description: Verify appropriate errors are shown if payment fails or 3D Secure is declined and no booking is confirmed.

steps.description: Proceed to Stripe Checkout with invalid/declined card
Attempt payment including 3D Secure authentication
Verify payment failure message is displayed to user
Confirm no booking confirmation is sent

title: Automated Contractor Assignment Algorithm Validity
description: Validate that the automated assignment algorithm selects the best contractor based on zone, availability, ratings, reliability, response time, and proximity.

steps.description: Trigger contractor assignment for a new booking in a specific zone
Check the assigned contractor meets the highest combined scoring criteria
Verify fallback broadcast method engages if no contractors fully qualify

title: Contractor Registration and Onboarding Workflow
description: Verify contractor registration enforces document uploads, background checks, Stripe Express account creation, and requires admin approval before activation.

steps.description: Complete contractor registration form including required documents
Submit background check information
Complete Stripe Express account onboarding flow
Verify admin receives notification for contractor approval
Check contractor status is inactive until admin approval
Admin approves contractor
Verify contractor status switches to active

title: Multi-Channel Notifications Delivery and Logging
description: Verify automated SMS and email notifications are sent at all key booking lifecycle stages with accurate content and delivery status logs.

steps.description: Complete a booking to trigger notifications
Verify booking confirmation SMS and email received by customer
Verify contractor receives job notification via SMS and email
Simulate booking reminders, contractor en route, start and completion events
Verify corresponding SMS and email notifications are sent
Confirm notification delivery statuses are logged in the system

title: Customer Dashboard Booking Management and History
description: Verify customers can view real-time booking status, booking history, payment methods, and use quick rebooking functionalities on their dashboard.

steps.description: Log into customer dashboard
Verify current bookings display correct status and details
Navigate to booking history
Verify past bookings are accurately listed
Access payment methods section
Verify saved payment methods display correctly and can be updated
Use quick rebooking feature on a past booking
Verify booking wizard pre-fills previous details and accepts modifications

title: Contractor Dashboard Scheduling and Earnings
description: Validate contractors view schedules, earnings summaries, performance stats, and receive/manage job offers via bilingual dashboard.

steps.description: Log into contractor dashboard
Verify schedule calendar reflects assigned jobs
Check earnings summaries display current and historical balances
Verify performance metrics including ratings and reliability are up-to-date
Navigate to job offers section
Verify new job offers are listed and actionable

title: Admin Dashboard Management and KPI Monitoring
description: Verify administrators can view KPIs, manage contractors and zones, oversee bookings, and access financial reporting through the dashboard.

steps.description: Log into admin dashboard
Verify KPIs are accurately shown (e.g., bookings, earnings, contractors active)
Navigate to contractor management
Verify ability to approve/reject contractors and view status
Access zone management
Verify zones can be edited and contractors assigned
Navigate to booking oversight
Verify ability to view, filter, and update booking statuses
Open financial reports section
Verify reports reflect correct commission calculations, payouts, and refunds

title: Quality Control Checklist and Photo Upload Enforcement
description: Validate contractors cannot complete jobs until all digital checklist items are marked, and before/after photos with metadata are uploaded and securely stored.

steps.description: Log into contractor job workflow
Attempt to mark job complete without completing checklist
Verify system blocks job completion and shows checklist items required
Complete all checklist items
Attempt job completion without uploading required before and after photos
Verify system prevents completion until photos with metadata are uploaded
Upload valid before and after photos
Check photos are stored securely with generated thumbnails
Mark job complete successfully
Verify job status updates accordingly

title: Customer Review Submission, Moderation, and Contractor Response
description: Verify customers can submit reviews, admins moderate reviews, and contractors respond, with impacts reflected in contractor performance.

steps.description: After job completion, customer submits a review via dashboard
Verify review is submitted but remains pending moderation
Admin reviews and approves review
Verify review is published and visible under contractor profile
Contractor logs in and responds to review
Verify response is displayed alongside review
Check that review rating affects contractor's performance metrics

title: Automated Commission Calculation and Payout Accuracy
description: Verify platform fee calculations, real-time contractor earnings update, payout scheduling via Stripe Connect, and audit trail integrity including refunds adjustments.

steps.description: Complete multiple bookings with payments processed
Verify platform fees are correctly calculated and deducted
Check contractors' earnings update in real-time correspondingly
Confirm scheduled payouts are executed through Stripe Connect
Process a refund for a booking
Verify contractors' earnings and platform fees adjust correctly
Check audit trail logs all financial transactions including adjustments

title: Mobile-First UI and Dark Theme Consistency
description: Verify all UI components conform to mobile-first design principles with fluid typography, adequate touch target sizes, and consistent premium dark-theme styling across English and Spanish locales.

steps.description: Access key pages (homepage, booking wizard, dashboards) on mobile device
Verify UI scales fluidly with no horizontal scroll
Check that all buttons and inputs meet minimum touch target sizes
Confirm dark theme styling loads correctly with gold accent and glassmorphism effects
Switch language between English and Spanish on all pages
Verify UI text updates dynamically and styles remain consistent
